website_summaries.verdict: Similar quality to salon masks in an easy-to-use design that has earned praise for producing noticeable results including soft skin that has a healthy-looking glow.
pros: A peel off mask that covers the entire face
Makes skin look and feel refreshed
Doesn't tend to be irritating to those with sensitive skin
cons: Pricey if you want to do frequent treatments, as there is only one mask per pack

website_summaries.verdict: A salon-quality collagen mask that delivers smooth, radiant results for most, making it a worthy investment in your beauty routine.
pros: Produces noticeable results for most users by moisturizing, exfoliating, and soothing the skin
Results in a soft, glowing finish
Provides coverage of the entire face
cons: Since you only get one mask for the price, regular use could get expensive

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to try this product. It arrived, then I left to go out of town. I came back and the holidays happened. But now that I’ve actually tried it, I literally went to Amazon right after I took it off and ordered some more. It rejuvenated my skin, and I could really feel the hydration and see the glow on my face. Korean beauty products are well known for their ability to restore moisture on your skin. And this product is so simple to use. Open package, put on face, wait a few minutes with a gold mask, and voila! flawless skin come through! 🤩
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Mira

customer_reviews.title: SO relaxing.
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice treat my girlfriend gave me. Treat yourself! It's refreshing and calming. My skin felt clean and soft after using the mask for the prescribed amount of time. She only got me one mask instead of several in a package which I appreciate, in case I didn't like it, but in fact I did. I may purchase one for myself in the future but I don't think I'd need several so the option to purchase one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Little Hitter

customer_reviews.title: Worked on Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: It's been years since I've done a hydrating face mask. I typically only do the clay masks, which kind of suck the moisture out of your face. So far, so good with this guy. It was hydrating, yet firming. The scent was lovely to relax to and the time flew by and I felt like I could've left it on for longer, but wanted to follow the instructions since I have sensitive skin. Typically though, I am constantly watching the clock for my opportunity to run to the bathroom and wash my face after I put on a clay mask. Anyways, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Cuyler

customer_reviews.title: Burned my skin and my skin is not that sensitive ...
customer_reviews.text: Burned my skin and my skin is not that sensitive. Also, way too expensive for what you get. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: My ONLY skincare product!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite skincare product! I didn't know if it was going to be worth the price. I have tried so many paper facials out there so I was skeptical that it would deliver. My face is still glowing. Immediately my face filled moisturized and refreshed. It was very luxurious looking as well as feeling. The smell is very mild, and fresh. I will be a lifelong customer. I no longer need my daily skincare regime, this mask does it all and leaves you looking radiant.
customer_reviews.author: osvaldo

customer_reviews.title: Amaing Gold Mask!!!
customer_reviews.text: I genuinely love this Elixir Gold Mask, it’s cooling and soothing on the skin. Another good thing is it’s definitely perfect for my dry skin since it gives me the hydration I need. After rinsing my skin feels so smooth and supple. Second photo, I didn’t use any product after using the mask but my skin feels amazing.
customer_reviews.author: SerenitybeautyyyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenating! Much needed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try the Elixir Gold Face Mask because it looks glamorous and has a lot of great reviews! I was hoping it would be as good as everyone says and... it is!!! I shared this photo with the packaging because I'm very appreciative of how nicely it is packaged. It has that mesh piece that makes it very easy to unfold (unlike some masks that are a mess and hard to figure out when you get them!) The mask does stay on your face very well, doesn't slide around. My skin feels very moisturized now that I have taken it off. It's the perfect treat yourself face mask!
customer_reviews.author: susie145

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Didn’t know what to expect but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Didn’t know what to expect but it was great! I feel like you could leave it on even longer than 20 minutes. It feels so nice =) I tried it at night and my skin was still really soft in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Golden glory
customer_reviews.text: I used this mask the morning of my sisters wedding. Skin felt amazing after and the makeup artist said my skin was some of the best he ever worked with, it was plump and moist. One complaint is that I received only 1 piece when it is advertised as 2. Since there was only 1 piece, it is a bit pricey for weekly use, but I think I need to incorporate in my beauty routine for twice a month and before any special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra L Plazas

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite skincare products!! Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This Korean golden face mask is everything! I love that it moisturizes and brightens skin. It has vitamin E and soybean essence which seriously softened my skin—love a healthy glowy skin! I can also see that it visibly minimized my pores. I’m all for skincare products that work! This face mask also stayed on very well, unlike some other ones I’ve had that kept falling off and I had to keep fixing it. LOVE! I highly recommend this product! Also, props to the seller! I need to mention that I received this product in a reasonable amount of time. I can't be happier about this purchase from the seller and the product itself!
customer_reviews.author: Camilla

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I genuinely love this Elixir Gold Mask. I’m a huge fan of sheet face masks and this Gold mask is AMAZING!!! Immediately my face filled moisturized and refreshed, 15-25 minutes are enough to give you radiant, glowing skin! And this mask is also the most beautiful one ever. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andriy Mosin

customer_reviews.title: Nothing great for $12
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting to see some results after applying the face pack but there was not even little glow on my face :( Paying another $10 I would have got a nice facial for 1 hr...The pack didn't even stick to my face, it kept coming out especially near the nose area it opens up...Not worth spending on this pack..I trusted this pack will help me get some glow and didn't get any facial before going on vacation :( I didn't have time to do anything later :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the result!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed more of a glow after using. I like the idea of using these regularly instead of going to get facials. These are way more affordable and feel just as good after!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Gold skincare
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of face masks! This one looked great! The packaging was nice! I used this as part of my nighttime skincare routine and I was very happy, it made my skin feel nice and soft! I am also a huge fan of 24k gold skincare! It is great for the skin!!
customer_reviews.author: Yanelis

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Face Mask
customer_reviews.text: This product is high quality. I’ve tried many different face masks and this is my favorite. The material is thick and held together really well. My face felt immensely moisturized. The whole experience was relaxing and enjoyable. I will buy these again and again.

customer_reviews.title: My skin feels really hydrated after using it
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product! My skin feels really hydrated after using it. I have some patchy spots on my skin where it gets really dry. This helped to even it out and moisturize my whole face. Highly recommend and will buy more of it!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this mask!!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this mask, and it was AMAZING! My skin felt so soft and rejuvenated after I used it. Some masks are rough on my skin and in the past has burned it. But, this mask left my skin feeling clear and detoxified! Everyone's skin is different, but I definitely recommend to try it. My skin still felt clear the next day, and it looked better too. This mask also has vitamin E in it, which is supposed to be really beneficial for the skin. Besides being good for the skin, it also looks cool when you have it on! It is a gold shiny metallic color and is super fun too.

customer_reviews.title: I love k-beauty and this brand is the best for me.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an essential product for skincare. I love k-beauty and this brand is the best for me. This mask I used one day where my skin came from being very tired and mistreated, I removed my makeup and applied the mask, after that my skin was super bright, alive and hydrated. I would buy it all my life. 100% recommended.

customer_reviews.title: I super enjoyed using this gold face mask
customer_reviews.text: I super enjoyed using this gold face mask! My skin felt and looked amazing after- I had a great even tone and glow to my skin for about 2 days, and my face felt hydrated and firm. I will definitely order and use again before winter is over- great pick me up for my skin.

My favorite time to use this mask is right out of my shower. I love relaxing with it on for a few minutes and just take time to reflect on my day. By far my favorite mask.

It's great and I would definitely recommend it.

customer_reviews.text: I’m really into this mask. I use a bunch of different face masks and really like the peel off ones like this. It was easy to apply. Suggestion - use the scrub before applying the mask, that way the moisturizing effect of this mask will be much greater.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Glow & Smoother Skin
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Golden Face Mask from Elixir Cosmetics for its moisturizing, brightening and smoothing abilities. The gold layer gives hydration and brightens the skin, while the sheet, which is a “cleansing layer”, gently exfoliates away dead skin cells and rough patches. I love how plump and soft my skin felt after just one use!

customer_reviews.title: great product

The mask itself is great for people who have dry skin but also suitable to all skin type if your looking to brighten up your face. It has a nice cooling feeling which I like! The size of the mask is also great because it perfectly fits my face. I definitelt recommend this face mask 👍🏻

I usually have to apply a ton of lotion for that to happen. But this mask is so moisturizing it totally helped and didn’t feel oily at all after either. I’m going to be buying these all the time.

Gives an amazing radiance.

customer_reviews.text: listen this mask is great but the price point is too high for what it is. will buy again if I feel like an only *mildly* irresponsible treat yoself moment.
customer_reviews.author: Ary

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing product and seller
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing product and seller. I bought this product based on my friend's recommendation. I typically do not write reviews but I was really happy with the results. My skin felt really smooth and hydrated. I do suffer from severe rosacea so I am very sensitive to many products, especially masks. However, I had no reaction and my skin was feeling amazing after this mask.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: My son is terrified, said it is my MASKED MURDERER FACE
customer_reviews.text: Other than emotionally scarring my son, this mask seems pretty good. This was my first ever "stick this one piece of film over your whole face" mask. When opening I was shocked at how SUPER WET it was. It seemed like it was covered with 1/4" of aloe-mixture. Therefore, it has the potential to be very messy. It definitely added some hydration to my skin, but I am not sure I will buy another as I am willing to bet there are masks out there just as hydrating that cost less. Plus, I can only afford so much therapy for my kids....
customer_reviews.author: Maria S.

customer_reviews.title: Great pampering session!
customer_reviews.text: I love sheet masks because they’re so easy to use and also mess free! I love that this is a gold mask, it feels and looks so luxe. It was very hydrating and also brightening. The fit was pretty good on my face and it stayed in place the whole time I had it on. I had a nice pampering session!
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Super moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mask! It was super easy to use and make my skin feel amazing. I had some dry patches around my nose which I always get once it’s a little colder outside and this mask made them go away. My skin feels super firm, and moisturizered. Love that it’s cruelty free and love the gold color. The seller was great, it shipped really fast and I had amazing customer service! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cora Royalty

customer_reviews.title: Works well even with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I don't often use face masks as I have sensitive skin, but I was able to enjoy this one without any burning or blotchyness afterwards. My skin was left soft and hydrated. Because I do have a tendency to break out when using new skin products I used this for the recommended time, and after removing I waited an hour then lightly rinsed any residual moisturizer off. It was a lovely little spa treatment!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Mask!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! It's a great fit and very comfortable. It had plenty of essence to keep my face moist throughout the time. I also had extra for putting on my neck, chest and back of my hands. These are important areas to do anything anti- aging on too, so the extra essence is great! Overall an amazing mask I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: A. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product !
customer_reviews.text: My skin was dry and itchy and I had never used a mask before, but after reading the reviews decided to give the Elixir Golden Korean Face Mask a try. It was very easy to use and it stayed on well. Made my face feel so soft and smooth Moisturized, I feel like a teenager again. I will definitely buy more of these. Wonderful Product.
customer_reviews.author: A D.

customer_reviews.title: Go gold
customer_reviews.text: I've used paper facial masks before and they felt awkward, this was silky and more like a light, cool cloth. My face was glowing immediately after use and softer. Plus, the gold color is so much more fun.
customer_reviews.author: TaraMetBlog

customer_reviews.title: Looks and smells good too!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mask that I've tried that looks cool when I'm wearing it! The mask smelled good and left my skin feeling soft and supple. It was easy to use and was a great addition to my weekly self-care routine.
customer_reviews.author: RebaTheDiva

customer_reviews.title: I love this mask!
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to apply and just 15-25 minutes are enough to give you radiant, glowy skin! My skin looked brighter and felt super soft after using it!! The essence isn’t sticky and is fast absorbing, no need to rinse off your face, just rub in remaining essence, and you are good to go!! Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Thompson

product_meta.title: Elixir 24K Gold Korean Collagen Face Mask - Anti-Aging & Moisturizing Peel Off Facial Sheet Mask
feature_bullets: SPA QUALITY TREATMENT: Korean beauty products are known for their dermal therapy treatments that penetrate deep in your skin to restore moisture. This full face mask has the effect of brush on gold spa treatments with much easier cleanup.

SMOOTH FINE LINES: Firm your skin for a youthful glow. Gold activated the basal cells of the skin which can help of reducing fine lines and the appearance of pores. It also slows down the reduction of collagen that comes with age so you look younger longer.

HYDRATING & EXFOLIATING: Get glowing skin through deep hydration. The tencel gel layer is soaked in anti aging ingredients like moisturizing collagen and Vitamin E. While the antioxidant Coenzyme Q10 fights free radicals that cause the look of aging.

EVENS SKIN TONE: Creates flawless, brightened skin. Gold and Coenzyme Q10 help to improve blood circulation and boost restorative collagen production so you can say goodbye to under eye circles and uneven pigmentation.

PRODUCT DETAILS: 1 MASK. Great for all skin types - including dry, oily and acne prone skin. Active ingredients include gold, hydrolyzed collagen, coenzyme Q-10, adenosine and soybean extracts. One size fits all. Comes as one time use single mask. Satisfaction guaranteed.
